choices: Let's make this anthro. You're an anthro male teen.
Let's make this anthro. You're an anthro female teen.
1.content: So, your mom was driving you to this new daycare she had discovered. according to her, a lot of parents take their teenagers here. You don't see why, you were fully capable of looking after yourself. And why are these other teens going there? It seemed kind of odd. Well, at the very least, it kept you out of trouble. She also said that the staff was run completely by females. You didn't find that odd, since females were the norm of for many daycares, with a male or two that helped out. You just wondered how the caretakers kept teens under control hadn't had them run off. Now, before we go further into the story, are you a male, or female.
1.title: Mom says it's time to do to Daycare.

11.content:
What kind of male teen are you


John: a 15 year old boy, blue colored hair and brown eyes. John hates going out because that means he has to interact with people

Harry: a 16 year old boy, blond hair and blue eyes. A sociable kind of kid you want around. Always excited to try new things

Ben: a 13 year old, brown hair hazel eyes. A short tempered kid who recently became a teen.

Gary: a 14 year old boy, red hair brown eyes. A teen who is too shy to even walk near people.
11.title: Male teen

111.content:
"Mom, do I seriously have to do this, I'm 15 years, not 15 months?"
"You have to go to daycare because mommy has to work. She also already paid for this."

She stopped the car at a daycare center, and the two of you walked inside. Your mother signed some paper work while you waited. They called your name and your mother kissed you on the cheek. "Bye sweety mommy loves you."

You followed a woman to a room with a large machine. It was some kind of laser with knobs and buttons.

"So your mother didn't sign this part, but do you want to keep your looks or get the looks of the age your about to become?"

"I'll keep my hair color if that's what your asking."

"Ok stand in front of this machine right here while I prepare your transformation. I walked over to it and waited

She started to press buttons and turn knobs until she pressed it. A burst of light was shot through my chest and the room instantly got bigger.

"Great news, your now ______"
111.title: John

choices: Go to one of the boys
Go to one of the girls
11131.content:
"Congrats on becoming 3 years old" she said while holding a mirror up to my face. I was looking at a young naked toddler with unusual blue hair. She picked me up and carried your naked body to another room. It was filled with screaming children of different ages. The we reached another door where very few children were at. The ones that were in the room were on some tables with their legs in the air.

The lady laid me down on a cold table and she strapped me to it. "Get me the fuck out of here." I demanded. She instantly shoved a pacifier into my mouth with the words, "Naughty boys shouldn't be saying those words. Don't worry, that was a warning."

I was questioning what she meant, but the pacifier tasted really good, and it was a great stress reliever. The lady did her magic and I was wearing a pillow. I wasn't sure how I moved when I was younger, but it must have been hard with all the puffiness of the diaper.

She carried me to the room with children, where I was set down around other kids my age.

"Now go and make friends while your here John"
11131.title: 3 years old

12.content:
What type of teen girl are you?

1. Alyssa- Brown hair, blue eyes. Sociable and outgoing.

2. Nicole- Blonde hair, blue eyes. Energetic and adventurous.

3. Chloe- Red hair, green eyes. Calm and agreeable.

4. June- Asian girl, black hair and brown eyes. Creative and affectionate.
12.title: Female teen

121.content:
"Oh, Alyssa. you're going to love daycare!" Mom said.
You looked at her skeptically.
"Mom, I'm a little old for daycare." You said, rolling your eyes.
Mom could be such a goofball sometimes. You were quite used to her eccentricity.
"Well, sweetie, this is a special daycare that makes you younger. Come on, it'll be fun!" Mom said.

Mom pulled into the parking lot and took you into AR Daycare. A nice lady took you down the hall to the regression room. They had you take off all your clothes.
"Mom, do you really have to watch this part?" You complained, doing your best to cover your breasts and crotch with your hands.
Mom laughed.
"Sweetie, pretty soon you won't care, trust me Alyssa. Besides, it's nothing I didn't see when you were younger." Mom said.
She was right, you didn't really care that much, you just wanted to complain. you let your arms down and allowed Mom and the daycare workers to see your teenage private parts. Your nude body wouldn't stay teenage for long, though.

Suddenly, you were zapped by the Age regression Ray, a beam from a powerful device that could add or subtract years from a person's age.

How old did you become?
121.title: Alyssa

1211.content:
You were transformed into yourself from when you were a small child! Your perky breasts were now flat, your legs were short and your genitalia was small and hairless. You were not even as tall as Mom's knee, and your hair lightened to a warm chestnut color. You looked in the mirror and smiled.
"Oh my god, I'm a kid again!" You said.
You ran over to Mom.
"Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!" You cheered, giving your mother a big hug.
"Aw, that's so sweet of you, Alyssa, but Mommy has to go for a while, that's why I'm leaving you with the daycare ladies ho work here." Mom said.
You turned to the daycare lady.
"So, Alyssa, we have all sorts of things you can do here. What do you want to do first?" She asked, patting your bare shoulder.
1211.title: Small Child

12111.content:
"OOH! I want to go play!" You said, energetically jumping up and down.
The daycare lady laughed and smiled at how enthusiastic you were.
"All right, but we need to get you dressed first. We cant have you playing naked, you know." She said.
The daycare lady took you to another room where they kept clothing and other supplies.

How did she dress you for play time?
12111.title: Play time

choices: A bathing suit of some kind
12113.content:
You remembered how warm it was outside and thought it might be fun to go swimming.
"Do you have a pool?" You asked.
"We sure do! Come on, let's get you into something to wear in the pool. we can't have you swimming naked, you know." The daycare lady said, poking your bare bottom.
She took you to a clothing room where they had all sorts of clothes for kids of an age. There was a special section for swimwear off to the side. They had one-piece bathing suits, they had two-piece child bikinis with cute little tops, and they had swim diapers for kids that needed them.

What does she dress you in?
12113.title: Swimming pool

choices: Green child size bikini with a frilly bottom
121131.content: What kind of bathing suit?
121131.title: A bathing suit of some kind

choices: Anna lifts you up and tosses you
121132.content:
Knowing that age regression often caused children to have trouble controlling their bodily functions, the daycare lady chose to put you in a swim diaper. She took out cute fluffy pink one and snapped it right on you. The daycare lady also got a couple of little inflatable water wing and put them on your arms, for in case you got in over your head. You were not given a top to wear, but you didn't mind. It actually felt good to run around without anything covering your flat, undeveloped chest.

The daycare lady took you outside by the pool. You wanted to jump right in, but she grabbed you by the arm.
"No, no. Not yet. It's a hot day and I don't want you getting burned." The daycare lady said.
She got out a bottle of sun lotion and slathered it all over your body. It felt good and made your skin tingle a little. It was hard to resist just standing there while all the other little girls in the pool were splashing and having fun. You could hardly control yourself. Finally, the daycare lady finished and you rushed into the cool clean water, giggling and laughing as you went.

You jumped right into the fun with a couple of other little girls playing with a beach ball. One had long black hair and was a bit taller than you. She wore a blue one-piece bathing suit. The other girl playing with the beach ball had shorter blonde hair. She was about your size, but instead of a swim diaper she had a green and white striped kids bikini bottom and a matching cute little top covering her chest. You bounced the beach ball right into he face and she laughed.
"Hi, I'm Alyssa!" You said.
"I'm Sarah." The blonde girl sad.
"My name's Anna." Said the black-haired girl in the one-piece.
Anna tossed the beach ball right back at you and hit you in the face. It was pretty funny, and you all laughed. You splashed them back.

Sarah swam a little bit closer to you. You took a closer look at her bathing suit.
"That's a really cute outfit, Sarah. I like the stripes." You said.
Sarah giggled.
"Thanks! That swim diaper looks nice on you too! Pink really looks good on you." Sarah said.
"You're looking goo too, Anna." You said.
"Thanks!" Anna replied.
You splashed the each ball back and forth for a while until...
121132.title: Swim diaper

choices: Your mum takes you over to the children.
Your Mother takes you over to a caretaker.
Your mum decides she herself is the best choice.
1213.content:
You watched as the world around you was slowly getting bigger and bigger "I should have told you this before but for this to work you're going to have to choose someone to carry you" your mother explained this as if everything was fine and you didn't understand exactly what she meant by "carry you" either.

Just as you reached an age where you could no longer stand your mother lifted you up and carries you into the daycare where you saw a bunch of girls ranging from ages 5 to 1 but what surprised you most of all was that some of the girls had bellies that made them look as if they were pregnant "now lets see who would be the best mommy to carry my precious daughter" you mother says while smiling down at your ever-shrinking form "don't worry, if we can't find a good mother here then I'll ask one of the caretakers to carry you" your mum says in an attempt to reassure you.

After a short while, your mother had made her choice and not a moment too soon as you've reached the size of an average baby.
1213.title: Fetus

122.content:
"Daycare? That's kinda odd. Wouldn't I be a little too old for daycare?" You said, brushing back your long blonde hair.
Mom smiled.
"Well... you won't be too old for it for long. Tis is a special daycare where... um... they regress your age." Mom said.
You instantly got excited. You had always wanted to be a kid again!
"Really? That... That sounds awesome, Mom!" You said.
"Oh, you're going to love it there! They have a play place and a ball pit, and trampolines for kid! They have a nursery for babies and, if you really want, they can make you into a fetus." Mom said.
This sounded amazing, almost too good to be true. You gave her a hug and almost caused her to crash the car.
"Thanks, Mom!" You said, lovingly.

Mom pulled up in the parking lot and you excitedly got out and into the lobby. You went right inside where you met a lady in the lobby.
"Welcome to AR daycare! Here to drop of your daughter?" The lady said.
Mom nodded.
"Yes, I'm here to drop off Nicole." Mom said.
The lady smiled at you.
"All right, let's get you to the Regression Machine." She said.
You and Mom followed her to a room down the hall. a large machine took up most of the space in the room, with a spot for you to stand where it would regress you.
"Take off all your clothes and stand on the big red 'X' on the floor."
You did as you were instructed. You had no problem being naked in front of your mother or this lady. Quickly you got onto the red X to be regressed.

How much do they regress you?
122.title: Nicole

choices: Pretty pink princess dress, light green panties, and a plastic tiara
1221.content:
In a flash the machine activated and zapped you with a regression beam. Your breasts shrank back and you became much shorter. Your hair grew shorter as well, to the length it was at when you were a kid. Soon you were just a little girl, no taller than your mother's knees. You looked down at your small body and smiled.
"Wow, I'm a kid again!" You said.
Your mother scruffled your hair.
"Nicole! You're so much cuter than I remembered! Look at you, you're adorable!" She said.
You and Mom shared a big hug.
"Now I have to leave for a while, I have some errands to run. I'm leaving you here for a few hours, okay?" Mom said.
"Sure thing!" You said.
You kissed your mom goodbye and the daycare lady picked you up.
"Come on, little Nicole we need to get you dressed." The lady said.
She took you to a changing room.

What do you wear?
1221.title: You become a small child

choices: Go crawl up in the plastic tubes
12213.content:
The daycare lady put you on a changing table and began to diaper you. She rubbed baby oil and powder on you and then taped up a thick, plain white diaper. You, of course, were slow to potty train as a child and needed diapers until you were six. The daycare lady patted you on the front of your diaper.
"There you go, sweetie. Let's get you into the play place." She said.
You were so eager to get to the play place you were shaking.

You were lifted up and carried down the hall to a large indoor playground. There were actually two indoor playgrounds, but one was for little boys and the other was for little girls. As far as your eyes could see there were tubes to crawl around in, elastic jungle gyms, trampolines, bounce houses, ball pits, slides... it was like a dream come true! You jumped out of the daycare lady's arms and jumped right into a ball pit. You swam through the plastic balls like a porpoise, bouncing and laughing like it was the best day of your life! Then, you bumped into another little girl and knocked her down.
"Hey! You crashed into me!" She said.
The other little girl had long brown hair and was wearing a T-shirt and shorts.
"Oof, sorry." You said.
She giggled.
"It's oaky. I'm not hurt. That's a cute diaper, by the way." She said.
You blushed. It suddenly occurred to you that most of the other little girls in the play place had more clothes than you. Most of them had shirts and wore shorts to cover up their panties or diapers, while you ran around topless, nearly naked, actually since you didn't have pants, only your thick diaper.
"Th... thanks!" You said, scratching the back of your head.
You helped her back up.
"My name's Christina!" The other girl said, doing a curtsey with an imaginary dress.
"I'm Nicole. I just got here." You said.
"This is my first time here too. Come on, let's go exploring!" Christina said.
Quick as a cobra, she grabbed you by the wrist and pulled you off on an adventure.
12213.title: A plain white diaper

choices: You crash into your adoring crowd
You land in the deep end and plastic balls fly everywhere
122132.content:
Christina pulled you to some nearby trampolines. they were on raised platforms above the ball pits, that way if a kid fell down, she would land in soft plastic balls.
"Come on, this is so cool!" Christina said.
The little girl began bouncing up and down on the trampoline. You went and joined her. The two of you went higher and higher with each bounce. It was fun but it was a little scary, in a way. You were pretty high up above the ball pits. Soon, other little girls gathered around watching you, impressed at how high you were jumping. Even Christina took a step back to admire your bouncing skill. Back when you were a teenager you had been a gymnast, so you actually knew what you were doing, although your innate childishness meant this was still quite thrilling. The audience chattered excitedly.
"Wow, look at her go!"
"That girl in the diaper sure can bounce!"
"Eek, she's going to fall!"
"Higher, diaper girl! Higher!"
Soon the crowd began cheering for you chanting, "Diaper girl! Diaper girl! Diaper girl!"
Christina stepped in to correct them.
"Her name aint diaper girl! She's Nicole!" Christina shouted.
Now they all chanted, "Nicole! Nicole! Nicole!"
You made your highest bounce yet, only to lose control on the way down! You were going to fall into the ball pit below!

Where do you land?
122132.title: Jump on a trampoline

choices: Have a quick diaper change and rush back to the play place
Sit on the potty chair and try to go
1221321.content:
"EEEEEEEEH! Watch out below!" You shouted as you came hurtling down to the bottom.
The other little girls barely had time to move. In an instant you crashed into them all and landed in a squirming, writhing pile of kids. None of you were really hurt, in fact it was kinda fun, like getting hit by a dodgeball. You all giggled and got to your feet. It was only after you squirmed free that you realized you had wet your diaper when you hit the ground.
"Aw man. I think I wet myself." You said.
There was clearly a damp spot on the front of your diaper. A few of the other girls looked down their shorts, and, sure enough, a couple of them had wet their pullups. Christina hadn't wet herself at all, but she offered to take you to the changing station.

Back at the changing station the daycare lady, having seen everything, already had a fresh diaper ready for you.
"Mrs. Daycare! Mrs. Daycare! Nicole needs a change!" Christina said.
The daycare lady picked you up and helped you out of your diaper, leaving you totally naked. She took a we wipe and cleaned you up nice and quick.
"Do you still have to go? If you do, I have a potty chair for you." The daycare lady said.
The potty chair was playfully shaped like a swan you rode on but with little handles for you to hang on to.
"I don't know..." You said.
You noticed one of the other girls who needed changes getting onto potty a chair too. Unlike you she still got to wear a shirt, but she seemed totally unashamed to be peeing or pooping out in the open like this. This must be a normal thing if you come to AR daycare all the time.

You eventually decided to...
1221321.title: You crash into your adoring crowd

choices: No, now run and go play
Christina wet herself while she was waiting for you
12213212.content:
You sat down on the swan shaped potty chair. You wrapped your arms around its long plastic neck. Somehow, it made you feel more secure. Christina pointed and giggled at you.
"Hee hee hee! Hey, Nicole, I can see your naked butt!" Christina said.
You giggled too. This whole thing felt silly, but in a good way. If you were in your teenage body and caught naked on a plastic swan-shaped toilet it would've been pretty much the most embarrassing thing that could happen to you, yet here you were as a small child and you didn't mind at all. In fact, you thought it was funny too.

You sat back and tried to relax a little. You imagined riding a giant swan through the sky, soaring above the streets. Your friend Christina waited patiently. Soon, a daycare lady came back for you.
"So, Nicole did anything come out?" She asked.
You stood up and let her inspect the potty chair. Nothing was there.
"Oh, I guess you didn't really have to go. Thanks for trying, though!" The daycare lady said.
She quickly got you changed into a new diaper, again leaving you wearing nothing else. You didn't mind, of course, but it seemed you would be running around nearly naked while the other kids had more clothes. It was a slightly thicker and bulkier diaper this time too, one with more padding on the butt for in case you had to poop.

Once you were powdered and taped up, Christina grabbed your arm. She was practically dancing with excitement.
"Come on, Nicole! Let's play some more!" She said.
The daycare lady grabbed her by the shoulder.
"Hold on, little Christina. How about I check you too?" The daycare lady said.
She looked down Christina's shorts to see if her pullups were dry.

Does Christina need a change too?
12213212.title: Sit on the potty chair and try to go

choices: Put Christina in a fresh pair of pullups
Take her clothes and make her wear a diaper like you
122132122.content:
"My, my. You're very wet, Christina." The daycare lady said.
She removed Christina's soaked pullups and wiped her clean with some wet wipes. Christina was slightly embarrassed by this, but overall didn't mind. As the daycare lady cleaned her, you decided to get her back for laughing at your butt earlier. You gave Christina a soft pinch on her exposed butt.
"Hey!" Christina said.
"Hee hee hee! It's Christina's butt!" You giggled.
Christina laughed too.

Now that the daycare lady had cleaned your friend, what did she do?
122132122.title: Christina wet herself

choices: The daycare ladies make you stop
You break free and tie Christina to the merry-go-round
1221321221.content:
The daycare lady cleaned off Christina and got her into a fresh pair of pullups before putting her shorts back on. You remained one of the only little girls dressed in nothing more than a diaper.
"Come on, let's go get back to the fun!" Christina said.
She pulled you to another trampoline near the ball pits, a huge one with several other girls bouncing on it. You jumped and danced like a wild monkey-girl until something caught your eye: there was a small ladder going up from the ball pit to a little yellow platform suspended by ropes above the ball pit, and on that chair was a paper crown, the same kind of crown you got with a kids meal at Burger King. You immediately decided, then and there, you would get that crown.

With a skip and a jump, you catapulted yourself onto the ladder. There were a couple other girls just sort of latched onto the ladder, just sort of hanging out. You laughed and pushed them aside, sending them hurtling to the ball pit below.
"Hey!" One of them yelled.
"Watch it!" The other shouted.
They weren't mad, just annoyed. You didn't care. That crown would be yours.

Quickly, you scurried upwards to the yellow platform and grabbed the crown. You put it on your head and stood tall, smiling.
"I am princess of the ball pits!" You proudly called out.
The girls below you all laughed at you.
"More like princess of the diapers!" Someone said.
They all laughed even more and playfully pelted you with plastic balls. Ten, one of them hit you right in the butt. You started to lose your balance.
"Whoa! Whoa! YIKES!" You shouted.
You stumbled and fell all the way down back into the ball pit. The other little girls kept on pelting you with balls.
"If you're a princess, then I'm revolting! Down with Nicole!" Christina laughed.
The other girls laughed and joined in.
"Down with Nicole! Down with Nicole!" They playfully chanted.
They all grabbed you in a mob and carried you out of the ball pits to a small metal merry-go-round, the kind you see on playgrounds for little kids. They got out a bunch of bungee cords and tied your arms and legs down to the merry-go-round. Christina picked up your paper crown and placed it squarely on your head. You laughed and smiled.
"All right, Nicole, ready for a wild ride?" Christina said.
You excitedly nodded. Christina turned to her followers.
"All right, time to spin the princess!" She called out.

Christina and her crowd began pushing the merry-go-round faster and faster until the whole indoor playground was one big colorful blur. It was a lot of fun, but there was no way it could go on for long.
1221321221.title: Christina gets to keep her pullups

12213212211.content:
You were smiling and laughing but it sadly couldn't last.
"Hey! What are you girls doing to Nicole?" The daycare lady said.
Your ride quickly came to a stop. The daycare lady untied you and picked you up.
"You mother's here, Nicole. Coe on, it's time to go." The daycare lady said.
"What? But I was having so much fun!" You said.
"Well, you can have more fun tomorrow. Come on." The daycare lady said.
You were carried to your mother, who was waiting in the lobby.
"Hey, Nicole! How was daycare?" Mom asked.
"It was great! Can I go again?" You asked.
"Of course, you can come back tomorrow." Mom said.
You were handed over to Mom. She carried you to the car and strapped you into a booster seat in the back.

As Mom drove you home, your mind turned to something you hadn't thought of until now.
"Hey, Mom, don't I have highschool tomorrow?" You said.
Mom laughed.
"Honey, you don't need to go to highschool anymore. You're just a little kid!" Mom said.
You were actually quite happy to hear that Mom intended to keep you as a small child. You didn't mind the diapers and loved the fun and lack of responsibility.

When you got home...
12213212211.title: The daycare ladies make you stop

122132122112.content: âOkay Nikki,â your mom started to say as she lift you up, âI need to check you before we head inside.â She check your diaper to discover....
122132122112.title: Mom checked yor diaper

1221321222.content:
The daycare lady got out a big, thick diaper for Christina. She removed Christina's shirt, leaving your little friend naked. Then, she powdered and taped up Christina's fresh diaper. Christina stood up, and patted herself on her padded butt.
"Ooh, the diaper look is pretty cute on you too." You said.
Christina giggled and looked back at the daycare lady.
"Thank you!" She said.
The daycare lady smiled warmly.
"Not a problem. Come see me if you need to be changed again." The daycare lady said.

The two of you skipped off to climb in the plastic tubes, suspended high above the ball pits. You looked up at the top of the tangle of tubes, slides, and little plastic rooms resembling clubhouses stacked high to the tall ceiling. You squealed with excitement.
"Where do you wanna go first, Nicole?" Christina asked.
You looked on for a moment, but couldn't decide. It all looked so fun.
"How about we just start exploring?" You said.
"Yeah!" Christina squealed.
You climbed into the tubes and made your way around. Some places had holes in the floor where you could drop down into the ball pits below. Some tubes went to twisting, curling slides. Another path of tubes went to a rubber jungle gym. Eventually, you both crawled your way to the summit. At the top there were two pathways. One went to the biggest, craziest slide in the playground, and the other went to a little clubhouse where some other little girls were hanging out.
"Oh, what should we do? That slide looks so cool, but the clubhouse looks fun too!" Christina said.
It was up to you to decide.

Do you go to the clubhouse or the slide?
1221321222.title: Christina is diapered too

12213212221.content:
"Let's see what the other kids are up to." You said.
You crawled to the clubhouse and found two more little girls there. They both wore T-shirts and shorts, hiding the pull-ups underneath, a sharp contrast to you and Christina's thick diapers.
"Oh, a couple of diaper girls! Hee hee, you aren't wearing shirts!" One of the clubhouse girls, a long haired redhead said.
She playfully poked your bellybutton and you giggled. The other girl, one with long darker-blonde hair went over to Christina and curiously touched her thick, fluffy diaper.
"Well, I'm Mallory and this is my bestie Alicia." The red-haired girl said, pointing to her darker-blonde friend.
"I'm Nicole." you said.
"Yeah, and I'm Christina." Christina added.
"Cool, great to meet you." Alicia said.
"Same here." Christina said.
"So, what'cha doing up here at the top of the world?" You asked, gazing out a window at the other kids playing in the ball pits far below.
"Just playing around. Since you two are in diapers we could play 'Mommies and Babies'." Mallory said.
Alicia laughed.
"Yeah, or we could jump around like wild girls! Woo!" The darker-blonde girl said.
She was bursting with energy, practically bouncing off the walls.

So, what will it be? Roughhousing or playing pretend as a couple of babies?
12213212221.title: Clubhouse

choices: A baby, too small to walk
124.content:
Mom stopped the car in the daycare parking lot. A friendly woman greeted the two of you outside.
"Greetings! Welcome to AR Daycare. Do you have an appointment?" The lady asked your mother.
"Yes, I'm here to drop off my daughter, June." Mom said.
The lady nodded and led you inside. The front lobby looked normal enough, although you didn't see any other teenagers around. There were small children and babies here, just typical daycare kids. You feared there was some kind of mix-up, you thought this was a daycare for teens.
"Um... Aren't I little old for daycare?" You said.
The lobby lady gave you a smile.
"Oh, honey, you're never too old for daycare. Come on, let's get you signed in." She said.

You were led to a room full of strange machinery.
"I need you to take off your clothes and stand on the red X on the floor." The lady said.
"Take off my clothes?" You said, confused.
The lady sighed.
"Just do it, okay? It makes it easier for everyone." She said.
Reluctantly, you stripped naked for this strange woman and stood on the red X on the floor, covering your teenage crotch and breasts with your hands. The woman pressed a button and something activated on the ceiling. Suddenly, a flood of strange green light erupted from all around you. You were engulfed in it. Slowly, you felt like you were getting smaller... the hairs on your teenage crotch fell out... and your breasts receded into your chest! You were getting younger! your age was regressing!

How far does June get regressed?
124.title: June

choices: T-Shirt, pullups (no pants, pullups are visible)
Just a thick diaper and nothing else
1241.content:
June was transformed into a small child.
"Hey! What did you do to me?" You asked.
The lady smiled at you.
"We made you into a child again, one young enough for daycare. Now you can enjoy the daycare experience without being an awkward teen!" She said.
Normally this would sound like madness to you, but somehow it clicked. You got to be a little girl again, something you thought you'd never get to experience ever in the rest of your life. You smiled and nodded.
"Oh, cool! Thanks!" You said.
The woman bent down and lifted you up in her arms. you gave her a quick hug. She was liking caring for you, you seemed to be one of the easier kids.
"Now come on, let's get you into some proper clothes." She said.

What clothing does she let you wear?
1241.title: A small child

choices: Ask the daycare lady for a snack (breast milk)
12413.content:
The daycare lady carried you to the changing station. She rubbed baby oil all over your butt and your diaper area, and then sprinkled some powder onto you. Finally, she got out a big, thick baby diaper with a pink flower pattern on it. The daycare lady slid it under your butt and taped it up, making sure it was nice and snug so it wouldn't leak.
"There you go, all done!" She said, patting your padded bottom.
You looked down and smiled. You had completely forgotten how comfy diapers were... and they made you look so cute!

The daycare lady held your hand and took you to the main room. The daycare was split between an all-girls side and an all-boys side. She, of course, took you to the girls section. Several other little girls, some of them just babies, were playing around and having fun. Most of them, like you, wore only a thick diaper.


What do you do?
12413.title: Just a thick diaper

choices: ...Whack the other kids on the butt with a toy rake
124131.content:
You wandered around until you found a couple of other kids who seemed like fun. One was a little blonde girl dressed in a cute long white sundress... and a thick white diaper underneath. The other little girl you decided to approach was like you, a little Asian girl... and like you, a thick white diaper was the only article of clothing she wore. The blonde girl was drawing with some crayons while her Asian friend was fiddling with a Barbie doll and annoying the blonde girl with it. The Barbie doll, oddly, was also dressed in a little paper diaper. You decided to introduce yourself.

"Hi, I'm June! Want to play together?" You said, smiling.
The other two girls smiled back.
"Sure!" The blonde girl said.
You sat down next to them and grabbed a crayon so you could draw too.
"My name's Lily." The blonde girl said.
"And I'm Ami." Said the other Asian girl.

The three of you drew pictures and talked about Ami's Barbie doll for a little bit, but you quickly grew bored. You wanted to spice up this trip to daycare. Besides, you were a kid now, and what's the fun of being a kid without doing something spontaneous and reckless.
"Hey, I have an idea!" You said.
Lily and Ami looked up at you.
"What is it?" Ami asked.
"How about we..."
124131.title: Play with the other kids

choices: You have to use your diaper
124132.content:
"I... I'm hungry. Can I have a snack, please?" You asked.
The daycare lady smiled and nodded.
"Of course! We have graham crackers and juice in the cupboard, or, if you want... we have some nannies that can give you breast milk." The daycare lady said.
You smiled and anxiously looked down at the floor. This was too good to pass up.
"I... I want breast milk." You said.
The daycare lady nodded.
"Come this way. You're going to love it here." She said.
She took you down the hall to another room. Inside were several large-breasted women. Some were nursing regressed babies and others held small children about your size in their arms. You were drawn to a tall, young, motherly woman with tan skin and dark hair. She looked a little like your mother, but with much larger breasts and hips. Your mother, like you when you were in your teenage form, had rather modestly sized breasts.
"Aw, you're a real cutie. What's your name?" The breast-milk nanny asked.
She was wearing only a pair of white panties and a white bra.
"I'm June." You said.
"That's a lovely name. You can call me Nana." The Nanny said.
She scooped you up in her arms and placed your head next to her beautiful breasts. She slowly removed her bra and gave you a look at her nipples, already starting to drip with milk. Eagerly, you suckled and savored every taste of that delicious, nutritious breast milk. It was so rich and creamy, it was the best thing you had tasted in years.

Nana rubbed your little tummy as you drank, cradled in her arms. It was a warm, happy moment you would never forget, drinking breast milk for the first time in years, your bare skin against Nana's warm body, the sweet taste of her milk, the soft crinkle of your diaper... it was magical. you closed your eyes and Nana patted you on the head.
"Wow, you're a hungry girl. Drink up, it's good for you." She said.
124132.title: Ask the daycare lady for a snack (breast milk)

1241321.content: You kept drinking as if this milked is the best thing in your life for the next 10 minutes until suddenly.....
1241321.title: Keep drinking

choices: You cuddled Nana not wanting to let go.
12413211.content:
All of a sudden you felt Nana pull you away. You look at her in a confused look.

         âWhatâs wrong?â You asked in a sad child voiced.

         âItâs nothing June. We are about to be swamped and some other children will need to drink soon.â Said Nana. What was your response?
12413211.title: Nana makes you stop.

choices: She regretfully asks you to go play with the others.
She encourages you to go play with others your age.
She suggested a way to fix it.
124132114.content:
“My you’re a bit affectionate?” Noted Nana as you cuddle to her.

“You look like momma. I want to be held like this for a long while.” You manage to say as old memories of you parents dropping you off at daycare start to surface. In most of those memories they would drop you off for most of the day only picking you up close to closing time. You barely had time to bond with them. Tears start to form in you eyes. Seeing this how does Nana react?
124132114.title: You cuddled Nana not wanting to let go.

choices: Me being assigned to be your wet nurse.”
Me being your personalized caretaker during your stay.”
1241321143.content:
âJune there maybe a way for me to be more attentive to your stay here?â Said Nana. You looked up at her face and try to wipe the tears from your eyes.

         âThere is?â You asked hopefully.

         âThere is,â Nana started to say, âit involves.........
1241321143.title: She suggested a way to fix it.

12413211433.content:
âWhy?â You asked in confusion.

         âThe younger you are, I will asked to be your personal caretaker until your mom picks you up. Do you want to do that?â Asked Nana. What was your answer?
12413211433.title: You getting younger.”

choices: Too many kids start coming in (wanting to drink milk)
A regressed girl comes in and wants to try and feed you
124132114331.content:
After you gave your reply Nana said "ok now close your eyes"

You did as she asked and for a second it felt like your body was changing in a way more severe than last time and when you finally opened your eyes again you found yourself being cradled by Nana... she was now holding your entire body in her arms!

"Wow," you thought to yourself, after thinking for a few seconds, it was pretty obvious that you had been turned into a baby.

Nana was looking down at you with a sweet smile that made it so you couldn't stop but stare at her beautiful lips. After taking a second to bask in her beauty, you latched back on and continued drinking her milk.
124132114331.title: Yes

1241321143312.content: You drank for a good 15 to 30 minutes until you are full. Nana slowly lifts you over her shoulder and starts lightly patting you on the back. You gave a loud and satisfying burp. What happens next?
1241321143312.title: You continue drinking uninterrupted

choices: Find some other girls to play with
1241322.content:
As you drank more of Nana's breast milk, you suddenly felt a strange, cramped feeling in your tummy. You moved your head away from Nana's breast and grimaced. You let out a soft, discomforted grunt.
"What's wrong, June?" Nana asked.
"Eeh... Uh... I don't know." You said.
Then the smell hit you and you figured it out... you had just messed yourself. Nana almost immediately made the connection as well.
"Oh, did someone make a doody?" She said, rubbing your shoulder.
You closed your eyes and nodded.
"Come on, let's get you cleaned up." Nana said.
Nana picked you up and took you to the changing station. You felt a little weird since you hadn't messed yourself in years, but Nana reassured you.
"One of the side effects of regression is that you lose most of your bowel and bladder control. That's why most of our kids need diapers." She said.
Nana untaped your diaper. She quickly and efficiently cleaned you up with wet wipes before getting you into a fresh clean diaper.
"Thank you, Nana." You said as she checked your legs to make sure it wouldn't leak.
"Not a problem, sweetie." Nana said.
She helped you back to your feet and you ran off to go play.
1241322.title: You have to use your diaper

13.content: So yeah, you are a male anthro. What type of anthro?
13.title: Let's make this anthro. You're an anthr...

choices: Everything was dark and furry... and you felt smaller.
You were laying on your back, and everything looked giant around you.
You're in a car seat, in a van full of children and caretakers. (Field trip.)
131.content:
You were a young teen anthro wolf. You had just started getting to that stage of maturity. But your life was full of problems. You had bullies that always picked on you and all your friends you once had, had been, supposedly sent to a special boarding school. All you had was your extended family, and your mother to keep you strong. Who knows, maybe the teens you meet will be more friendly then the ones you already knew. It wasn't like you knew the whole town. Soon the car stopped and your mother and you got out. Once you made your way in, you were greeted by many anthro furries, like a lioness, a tigress, a leopardess, a black pantheress, a bear, a vixen, and a kangaroo. "Welcome, you must be Rocksha, and this young man must be your son Ronak," Said the Vixen. (Yes, your name will be Ronak in this storyline.)

"Yes, I am so sorry that it took me so long to bring him here. Work always got me sidetract, but I finally got here," Your mom said.

"We understand" said the tigress and she continued "Now if you could have your son wait here for a moment, we'll take you back to the office and have everything taken care of."

You had no problem waiting. As they went back to the office, you looked around to see if you could spot other teens. No luck so far. Being the well behaved boy you were, you waited patiently, not knowing what was happening in the office. After a while you heard the door open and your mother say, "Thank you so much for this. I'll be back around two, maybe three to pick him up."

"It's no trouble at all Rocksha, Ronak is in good hands here. We'll make sure his stay is pleasent til you return," The leopardess said.

You soon said your goodbyes to your mom, and then you felt a prick in your shoulder. "Ow!" you yelp.

"I apologize dear, we give the shot to every teen who comes to our daycare. We do it when you have your attention on something else, in case you are not fond of needles," Said the Lioness.

You felt she had a point, wished she had given you a warning. but you wondered in your head 'what was in that shot?' You were starting to feel a little dizzy and were starting to lose your balance. You then remember as you fell back being caught by the Kangaroo and she said softly, "Easy does it little one."

That was the last thing you remember before blacking out. When you awoke...
131.title: Wolf

choices: I'll grow up again the natural way. I like this.
Well, I'll probably grow back up once summers done.
Wait! I want a third option.
1311.content:
Everything was dark when you came to. But it was also very comfortable, and furry, so you weren't fully alerted to your situation. Now, it wasn't completely dark that it was pitch black, but it made it difficult to figure out where you were. You also heard voices. They sounded like one of the caretakers you saw earlier, but the voices were a bit muffled, so you couldn't make out what was being said, but it sounded calm, warm, and comforting, much like the place you were laying in. You soon start to move around and rub your eyes, trying to wake yourself up. You heard the caretakers voice again, then, out of nowhere, the furry confines you were laying in started to behave like a hammock, and swung your furry bed side to side. Soon the swinging stopped, and a light entered from above. It blinded you for a moment, but then you saw gigantic furry hands reaching in, coming right at you. Upon seeing this you begin to panic, and try to move away from the approaching hands, but that proved futile, since there was limited space where you were, and the hands had no trouble coming under your armpits and lifting you out, as if you were a little cub.

When you were able to adjust your eyes to the light, you saw yourself staring at the Kangaroo known as Rhea. But now, she looked giant to you, as she held you like a little cub in front of her. "Easy there Little Ronak, it's okay, calm down," She instructed in a motherly tone.

You hadn't been called Little Ronak since you were, well, little. "W-what appen to mes?" You asked.

You cover your mouth immediately after having heard a change of tone in your voice, that now sounded like your childhood voice. You then saw yourself, and could see that not only were you smaller, but you were now wearing the attire of a baby wolf pup. You look to Rhea, wanting answers to you current situation. Rhea sat you on her lap and held you in place as she said, "Well, if you remember we gave you a shot. That shot was known as Youth Serum. We give it to all that come to our daycare. This is why we call it Age Regression Daycare, or A.R. Daycare as the sign reads outside. This is where many teens, who are a lot like you, come to have a second cubhood, or in your case puppyhood. Some have even come back for a third experience. And the mothers are not in disagreement. Your mother told us about how you've been wanting to be a cub again and get away from your high school problems. She even took some serum herself to get a little younger, and she also took another serum to prepare for your puppyhood again. She signed all the papers to certify that she allowed this to happen, and cannot try to sue us for money, since some have tried that in the past. But we know she's not like that. Now, you have a chance to have a cute little puppyhood again. I'm sure you guessed by now that this is why you hadn't seen other teens on arrival."

Well, you hadn't expected this to happen, but you weren't against your mother's decision to have this happen either. For many years, you had wished to have your puppy days back, when you were still padded and were nursing from her for nourishment. Yes, you had fond memories of this, because your mother was one of those mothers who felt that children should grow up in their own good time, and that she should not force you to grow up, so, potty training took it's own course on your time, and weaning from your mother took even longer. But now you were back at that stage where you were able to enjoy your mother's sweet milk once more. How could things get any better?

Now that you thought back to it, before your mother left, you had notice a few differences in her figure, but you thought you were imagining things, Rhea seemed to indicate that she was ready to nurse and diaper you all over again. "H-how wong I stay wike dis?" You ask, realizing you speech was impaired a bit.

"Well, there are two options you can have. You can either let nature take its course and grow up naturally again over the years, or we have this age serum that can give you back your original age again when you feel your ready to be grown up again," Rhea said.

You decide.....
1311.title: Regressed and in a cozy pouch.

choices: Stay this young for as long as I like and not age to teen again?
Can I be back in my Mama's tummy?
13113.content:
"A third option?" Rhea asked.

"Yes," You say, "Can I..."
13113.title: Wait! I want a third option.

choices: Newborn. Not even a day old yet.
Nope, even older then those options

131131.title: Stay this young and not get older?

choices: Is there a way to do this?
No, there is no way for you to go back in her tummy.
131132.content: "I wanna go back in momma's tummy! I wanna feel her warm walls around me... I wanna give her a big sexy puppy belly, and be fed through her umbilwacle cord." Ronak chimes, getting a little boner from the thought of his mommy with a big round belly.
131132.title: Can I be back in my Mama's tummy?

14.content: What type of anthro are you
14.title: Let's make this anthro. You're an anthr...

info.brief_description: You're a teenager, but your mom thinks you need to go to daycare again. Have fun.
info.description:
Okay, so you are a teenager, living in a small town. Today though your mom thinks you should be attending Daycare. You don't know why, you're old enough to look after yourself when she's gone. But your mother is stubborn when she makes a decision she thinks is best for you and there is no changing that. When you get to this new daycare called A.R. Daycare, you will find out why it is called that. (Hint hint, age regression story.)

So there will be no death in this story. No child abuse. Only vore allowed is unbirth. I want to keep the mention of diaper usage to a minimal. Don't make chapters that go into heavy detail about the main character (you) using the diaper. Oldest age for the main character once regressed will be 5 years old. Youngest will be to 8 months of the "mother" being pregnant with them. So no absorption/digestion chapters. There can be chapters that take place outside the daycare. Breastfeeding and grownups interacting lovingly with the main character is highly encouraged. Do not turn the mother or caretakers of the Daycare into control freaks that makes the main character do their bidding. Keep these chapters loving and caring chapters. I will allow lesbian women couples, but no gay men couples in this story. Gender swapping is allowed, but don't make it where the main character switches back and forth repeatedly. One more thing, do not make mental regression chapters. This will only be physical regression.

Any chapter that goes against the rules stated above will be deleted. If you have any questions, feel free to ask me on my on site email. Have fun adding to the story. Help me to get at least 45 chapters up and continue after that... Please.
